Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Autosomal dominant neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus associated with a missense mutation encoding Gly23 - - > Val in neurophysin II .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Autosomal dominant neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus |
| Neurohypophyseal diabetes insipidus |
| Diabetes insipidus |

Note: "Autosomal dominant" and "neurohypophyseal" are not diseases, but rather terms that describe the inheritance pattern and location of the disease, respectively. Therefore, they are not included in the list of diseases.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Diabetes insipidus |

The following entities do not clearly refer to a disease:

* "Autosomal dominant" (inheritance pattern)
* "neurohypophyseal" (location)
* "neurophysin II" (protein involved in the disease)
* "Gly23" and "Val" (amino acids involved in the mutation)
